name: ADMISSION_COMMENTS
description: This table contains the Admission Comments (I EPT 10155) for each patient

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Contact serial number is unique accross all patients and all contacts

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The Contact Date for the Patient Record

columns.name: ADMISSION_COMMENTS
columns.description: The admission comments entered for each patient.
